subject: Re: [junit] New user can't post to forum
msgSnippet: David, Those forums were purposely shut down, in favor of this mailing list, but the archives were left up as search-engine targets.  I thought the home page
messageBody:
David,

Those forums were purposely shut down, in favor of this mailing list,
but the archives were left up as search-engine targets. I thought the
home page of the forums used to have a very prominent notice to this
effect. I'll look into it.

David Saff

On Mon, Mar 8, 2010 at 6:37 AM, David Bala≈æic <xerces9@...> wrote:
> (not sure where else to send this)
>
> Hi!
>
> I created a new user account at http://www.junit.org/forum/ and after
> login it says on all pages:
> You are not allowed to post a new forum topic.
>
> Is this normal? There is no explanation to be found about this.
>
> For the actual reason I subscribed, I'll post a separate message.
>
> Regards,
> David
